## Overview

Please see [the slides](/slides/lecture01-lab.qmd) for more details.

## Instructions

1. Read and go through the [Software Installation Guide](/setup.qmd) for instructions on setting up your computer for this course.
1. Follow the link to lab 1 assignment from Canvas (it should start with `classroom.github.com`). It may take a few minutes for the site to configure your repository.
1. You will get a message saying " Your assignment repository has been created: ...". Click on the link to go to your repository.
1. Clone the repository to your computer and open it in Visual Studio code.
1. Open the `solution.qmd` file and add your name, netID, and date to the YAML header.
1. Verify that you can render the document and check the box to confirm that you have completed the lab.
